title: Bayer
description: Bayer is known for its vivid and dynamic color palette, featuring a refreshing blend of aqua blues (#00BCFF, #00617F), a deep teal (#10384F), and a vibrant green (#89D329). These colors symbolize the brand's commitment to health, innovation, and sustainability. The colors are openly detailed in the brand's official guidelines, available on their corporate identity network and outlined in their comprehensive Brand Guidelines document.
